title: Roman Catholic Youth Ministry in Wisconsin and the Meaning Crisis
description:
Ryan is a cradle Catholic and is serving the youth in his church in Wisconsin. He's trying to apply what he's learning about the Meaning crisis in his work with the youth. 

Raised RC, after divorce went to church with Mom
Moved in with Grandparents. Started get serious about religion
Books. Peace Pilgrim and Dialogues of Plato
Wisconsin
Started seeing benefits of going to church
Got involved with a youth ministry
Lesson plans for confirmation kids
Vervaeke
Rider and the Elephant
